name: dnspchecker
short_description: DNS progapation checker is program for linux and windows and uses ping command automatically every 60 seconds to see is DNS live. Can be minimized to systray and gives alert when DNS is propagated. Made in Lazarus & FreePascal by Aleksandar Josifoski
